Package com.cy_siao.dao

Class BedDao

java.lang.Object
com.cy_siao.dao.BedDao
public class BedDao extends Object
Data Access Object for managing Beds entities in the database

  • Constructor Details

    • BedDao

      public BedDao()
      The default constructor - initializes the database utility

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create(Bed bed)
      Inserts a new Bed record into the database and assigns the generated ID to the provided Bed object.
      Parameters:
      bed - The Bed object to be created. The nbPlacesMax is determined by whether the bed is double (2) or single (1), and the IdRoom is taken from the bed to associate it with the correct room. The ID generated by the database will be assigned to the bed.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the database operation fails

    • findById

      public Bed findById(int id)
      Retrieves a Bed object from the database based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the bed to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Bed object corresponding to the given ID, or null if no bed with the specified ID exists or an error occurs during retrieval

    • findAll

      public List<Bed> findAll()
      Retrieves all bed records from the database.
      Returns:
      A List containing all Bed objects in the database, or an empty list if no beds exist or if an error occurs during retrieval

    • countTotalBeds

      public int countTotalBeds()
      Counts the total number of beds in the database.
      Returns:
      The total number of beds, returns 0 if an error occurs during counting

    • update

      public void update(Bed bed)
      Updates an existing bed record in the database.
      Parameters:
      bed - The Bed object containing the updated information including: - whether the bed is double or single (determines nbPlacesMax) - the ID of the associated room (IdRoom) - the unique ID of the bed (Id) to locate the record

    • delete

      public boolean delete(int id)
      Deletes a bed record from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the bed to delete
      Returns:
      true if the bed was successfully delete
